display_name: Sleep Problem: How Often: Need to take sedatives or sleeping pills
description:
Survey1: From mailed survey 1 (mailing year: :survey_year_s1:)

Option #5 was not offered as a separate option for the Agency 1 participants. For them, Option #4 included the wording for both the later Options #4 AND #5 combined.
